title: Sight Words: The Basics
description: Learn the 10 most common sight words that appear in almost every book!
subject: sight-words
objectives: Read sight words in simple sentences

activities.instructions: Sight words are words we see all the time! Let's learn some important ones.
activities.content:
Sight words are special words.
We need to know them by sight!
Let's learn: the, a, is, it, to

activities.instructions: This is one of the most common words! Say it with me.
activities.spokenInstructions: This word is THE. Can you say the?
Practice these words. The, a, is.

activities.instructions: Great job! Now let's learn more sight words.
activities.spokenInstructions: Practice these words. It, to, and.

activities.instructions: You're doing great! Here are more words to know.
activities.spokenInstructions: Practice these words. He, she, we.

activities.question: I want ___ go home.
activities.explanation: I want TO go home. 'To' shows where you want to go!
